title: So i got halfway through writing up a list of 20 or so trolls.
body:
And i realised, you know what, riot isnt going to fucking ban them.

They are just gonna remove their names from this post so i cant even warn the community about them, even though they have been at large for over a fucking year now.

And im just going to end up getting punished.

Does that sound like a company that cares about their community to you? Sure doesn't to me.

replies.body:
Name and shaming is a bad thing (Even if they deserve it)
Just report them at the end lobby, or write a support ticket to them.
And include screen shots / Video evidence of your "Proof"

I think you ignored the part where i said "they have been at large for over a year now"

Basically ive been repeatedly reporting them for a year to no avail.

Clearly they dont actually audit their reports properly.

aka they dont care.

To be completely honest, i used to love league, i still enjoy playing it on occasion, but its been a looooooong time since i actually loved league.

Infact it was back before we had the oce server, my fondest memories of league are a working tribunal system, and people were actually fucking scared to lose their accounts.

The sheer idea of the statement "pfft report me i wont get banned anyway" was ludicrous, crazy talk.

Those days are over.

And so is the idea of having a good community.

People have been banned, and some even perma banned.
If the ones you have "Reported" haven't been banned, it either means a team is still investigating them.
Or riot thinks they don't deserve a ban.

If you still feel like they deserve it or what ever, take it up with a support ticket.

Thats the problem Some have been banned.

If i kill one nazi i havnt suddenly won world war 2.

If i squish one ant i havnt destroyed the entire hive.

You can point out all these people that have been banned like "look at all these"

And i will find you 20 times as many people who are going under the radar, simply because we dont have a tribunal anymore.

Its disgusting as the punishment system also tends to backfire and hurt the victims too.

its like how can you have a system so strict that people who arent even breaking the rules get punished, but full on professional log in to do nothing but, trolls go scott free.

What kind of backwards automated system is that.

They dont have the man power to read every single report i get that, but they dont have to.

Thats what a tribunal system is for.

And the reason why ive been pissed off at riot for scrapping it (they say they are working on it but we know they arent)

Trolls or bad players are not Nazi's or Ant.
Sure they are assholes, and sometimes they could just be bad or having a bad day.
There were Alliance members who were assholes, who would find people solo them out and beat them up.
Does this make them Nazi's?
No it doesn't.

And sure you could find 20 times more trolls, there will always be trolls.
You could perma ban there accounts, they will just make another one and do the same thing all over again.

The Absolute best thing we could do, is just keep an eye on them. Report them.
Maybe sometimes they will turn a new leaf. Maybe not.

Back in 2013-2014 I use to be a huge asshole, not reportable worthy but basically I was a C*nt.
People change over time, sometimes they don't.

The punishment system can backfire, Ive seen (To my knowledge) 2 people get Wrongfully punished.
But riot can fix that easy.

And there was a reason why the tribunal got removed, I do miss it myself.
I had over 200 Perma bans done.
I had gone over 3000+ cases.
I had an accuracy of about 85%

However it had flaws, some summoners would just always hit the "Ban" button, this caused waaaaaay more backlashes and backfires of innocent summoners being punished and hurt.
People about 10+ random summoners just always hit the "Ban" button.

Nothing is perfect, the tribunal wasn't. Even tho I do miss it.
And certainly not this current system.

Re-implement tribunal system but without the rewards.

Also implement an accuracy threshold.

Hey presto fixed the system.

There you go riot i just did what you've been trying to do for the last 4 years, or so you say.

As for the "they will make new accounts" not if you IP ban them.

The only reason rito doesnt do ip bans is they know if they ban someone they will make a new account and spend more money.

The illusion that they actually care is fickle at best.

New champions, new modes, new skins.
New things, Champion mastery Hextexh crafting.
Banning boosters in waves, banning botters in waves.

tweaking and fixing old systems.
They finally got EUW to work.

Sorry that Riot hasn't met your standards.

Cool, so they worked on a bunch of stuff to make them money.

Instead of doing the one thing most of the community actually wants, a working report system.

I see how it is.

they made a whole bunch of things for the community, keeping these game modes up makes them no money at all.
Only makes us happy.
Champion mastery makes them no money.
they spent THOUSANDS of dollers to work out and fix EUW.
That didn't make them any money at all.

We have a working report system. People get banned, bots get banned people get punished.

Just not the way you want it.

Riot has done a lot of things for the community which you seemed to be blind too.
The Ocean week (Times 2)
Charity skin.

No im aware of all that, but i see them more as ways to appease us temporarily.

bandaids to a gaping wound that is a slowly dying community if you will.

Im not the only one who thinks this game is dying.

Look at any major league youtuber, hell look at dunkey, he literally quit the game because of how toxic league was becoming, and because he got backlashed in the same way i mentioned earlier where the report system fucks over the victim.

Dunky quit league not because of toxicity.
But because HE was toxic, sure the guys were assholes.
But he still was toxic, and he got banned for it.
It was only a 2 week ban, and he asked riot to lift it until he finishes his video.
In which they said no, that's why he quit
Sky (His best friend) even said that Dunky deserved the ban.
Dunky was not a victim.

Was he the aggressor or providing a rebuttal to another assholes aggression.

And after answering that, did the other person get banned.

I think you know what im getting at there.

Whether he was the aggressor or not, being toxic i still being toxic.
And we dont know if those other guys got punished. Its not our right to know.
They probably did if they got reported, they also probably got banned.

We will never know.

In my experience, no no they didnt.

And frankly id be very surprised if they did.

Id be willing to wager money on it infact.
